LanguageData.EmpathyChangesTooltip: Turn this off to restore colonists' reactions to bad things happening to other people to normal. This will increase difficulty; Bleeding Heart pawns will be unaffected. Restart the game after disabling this.
LanguageData.SexualityChangesTooltip: Turn this off to disable Kinsey scaling of pawns and re-enable the Gay trait. You may want to restart the game after toggling this.
LanguageData.KinseyModeTooltip: This setting determines what formula is used to weight the Kinsey scale when pawns are generated.
LanguageData.SabotageIncidentTooltip: Many people mistake this incident for a bug the first time they encounter it. As a result, you must opt into the random event, so you know why it's happening.
